para1.text: The Arabidopsis 14-3-3 proteins exhibit amino acid similarity, with some regions being highly conserved and others showing divergence. Sequence alignments and structural models help visualize these patterns (img-2052, img-2053).

para2.text: The degree of amino acid similarity across the 13 Arabidopsis 14-3-3s is displayed graphically (img-2052). Residue conservation is highest in the client binding channel (img-2053).
